techmeme.title: Sources: Apple is testing a more conversational version of Siri, dubbed "LLM Siri", with plans to release it in spring 2026 as part of iOS 19 and macOS 16 (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Spotify adds new audiobook features for Premium users: video clips up to 30 seconds long, Author Pages, and visuals that appear while users listen (Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch)
Sources: a16z, Ripple, Kraken, and Circle are jostling for a seat on Trump's promised crypto advisory council, which is expected to set up a bitcoin reserve (Hannah Lang/Reuters)
Sources: Amazon will likely face an EU investigation next year into whether it breaches the DMA by favoring its own brand products on its online marketplace (Foo Yun Chee/Reuters)
The EU Parliament confirms Spain's Teresa Ribera as the next Competition Commissioner of the EU, replacing Margrethe Vestager (Lukas Knigge/Table.Media)
